item.description:
What about Boynton Park in Worcester? Worcester's most "Unofficial" dog owners meeting place.
- Boynton Park Worcester, Massachusetts 01612
- Near the Worcester Airport
Directions: Off 122 - Mower St - Right hand side in-route to Paxton.
This park is a large softball/soccer field and is surrounded by the larger acreage of well maintained G.W.L.T. hiking trails for short or longer hikes with your best friends
item.name: Worcester Dog Park
